trans-unit.source: Document library for managing applications | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Document library for managing applications | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory application management topics, with technical reference links for how-to, troubleshooting, and FAQs
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory application management topics, with technical reference links for how-to, troubleshooting, and FAQs

trans-unit.source: This page contains helpful links for the major features of single sign-on with Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This page contains helpful links for the major features of single sign-on with Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The links are organized into the following categories:
trans-unit.target: The links are organized into the following categories:

trans-unit.source: **Overview:** An overview of the feature, with use cases and topic introductions.
trans-unit.target: **Overview:** An overview of the feature, with use cases and topic introductions.

trans-unit.source: **How-to:** Detailed instructions to get started with specific scenarios.
trans-unit.target: **How-to:** Detailed instructions to get started with specific scenarios.

trans-unit.source: **FAQ:** Answers for typical questions and concerns.
trans-unit.target: **FAQ:** Answers for typical questions and concerns.
